statements: SELECT * FROM authorized_access;
SELECT business_name, sensitive_data FROM authorized_access;
SELECT * FROM authorized_access WHERE id = 1;
SELECT business_name, access_time FROM authorized_access ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authorized_access WHERE business_name = 'Company A';
SELECT * FROM authorized_access WHERE id = 1;
SELECT business_name, sensitive_data FROM authorized_access WHERE access_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM authorized_access WHERE business_name LIKE 'ABC%' AND sensitive_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, business_name, access_time FROM authorized_access WHERE access_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, business_name, sensitive_data FROM authorized_access WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM BusinessInformation;
SELECT business_name, sensitive_data FROM BusinessInformation;
SELECT * FROM BusinessInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT business_name, sensitive_data FROM BusinessInformation WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM AccessLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, business_name, sensitive_data FROM BusinessInformation WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AccessLogs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM BusinessInformation WHERE business_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS 'login_count' FROM AccessLogs GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT business_name, SUBSTR(sensitive_data, 1, 10) AS 'partial_data' FROM BusinessInformation ORDER BY business_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BusinessOwners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, email FROM BusinessOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, role FROM BusinessEmployees WHERE business_id = 3 ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccessLogs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_log_time FROM AccessLogs;
SELECT * FROM BusinessOwners;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM BusinessOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, role, access_level FROM BusinessEmployees WHERE business_id = 5 ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM AccessLogs WHERE action LIKE 'Login%' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT employee_name, action, timestamp FROM BusinessEmployees JOIN AccessLogs ON BusinessEmployees.employee_id = AccessLogs.user_id WHERE BusinessEmployees.role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM businesses;
SELECT business_id, industry FROM businesses WHERE business_name = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM businesses WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT business_name, industry FROM businesses WHERE business_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT data_id, data_type, data_content FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_type = 'Confidential' ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND action = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT employee_id, job_title FROM employees WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM access_logs ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT data_id, data_type, access_level FROM sensitive_data WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, job_title FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM access_logs WHERE accessed_table = 'sensitive_data' AND access_type = 'READ' ORDER BY access_time DESC;
SELECT employee_id, data_type, access_level FROM sensitive_data WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT dept_name, location, manager_id FROM departments WHERE location = 'New York' AND manager_id IS NOT NULL;
